headline: India leaves crypto and stablecoins at the door in fintech jamboree
summary: MUMBAI (Reuters) -At the world's largest gathering for the financial technology sector in Mumbai this week, more than 800 speakers tip-toed around two topics that have captured attention globally: cryptocurrencies and stablecoins.  The annual conference kicked off just as bitcoin catapulted to an all-time high above $125,000 but that milestone found no mention at the conference on the back of India's regulatory caution around the sector.  India is leaning towards not creating legislation to regulate the sector, Reuters reported last month.

headline: Earnings Preview: What To Expect From PayPal Holdings’ Report
summary: PayPal Holdings is set to unveil its third-quarter results later this month, and analysts expect its earnings to remain flat year-over-year.

headline: Will Lemonade (LMND) Elevate Its Global Brand Strategy With New Board Appointment?
summary: On October 6, 2025, Lemonade announced the appointment of Geoff Seeley, Chief Marketing Officer of PayPal, to its board of directors as a Class I director through 2027. Seeley brings a strong track record in global marketing and technology-driven customer growth at brands like PayPal, Afterpay, and Airbnb, signaling Lemonade's plans to advance its global marketing and consumer reach. We'll explore how Seeley's addition to Lemonade's board could influence the company's investment narrative...
